entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
